nodes.text: Star Wars Miniatures: The Clone Wars advertisement

Star Wars Miniatures: The Clone Wars advertisement is an advertisement produced by Wizards of the Coast to advertise the Star Wars Miniatures set, The Clone Wars. The third in the series of advertisements, it is the first one not to mix characters from different eras. Instead it focuses on another feature of Star Wars Miniatures, where powerful characters (in this case Durge and Grievous) can be taken down by weaker characters, like Ahsoka Tano, and even clone troopers. The advertisement was included in Star Wars Insider 105.

After killing Jedi Master Yoda, Durge prepares to deal with Ahsoka Tano and her troopers with extreme ease, but is shot down by a couple of clones instead. Meanwhile, Ahsoka duels General Grievous and quickly defeats him, cutting off several of his limbs. After the battle the clone troopers reflect upon their achievement, wondering what the next order is going to be.
